The organization should consider partnering if external providers have knowledge that the organization does not have, or to share the risks and opportunities associated with its projects (and the resulting profits or losses). Partners can be external providers of processes, products or services, technological and financial institutions, governmental and non-governmental organizations, or other interested parties. The managing of external providers should take into account the risks
